Name: Lanterns
About the game: Lanterns is a co-operative platformer where two players must work together to solve a gauntlet of unique puzzles. Players control a red and blue character that are able to shine a ray of light, of like colour. Objects in the world react in many ways when illuminated by these mystical lights, however timing, precision and a lot of communication will be required to conquer each trial. Play as Red or Blue and navigate through levels, or lead your teammate to temporary inevitable doom. Unlock different characters and along the way, and discover secret areas.
